caption.body: With inspiration from the poem “Romance Sonámbulo” by Federico García Lorca, Bulgarian-born filmmaker Theodore Ushev evokes the universe of surrealist painter and sculptor Joan Miró with a procession of pulsating forms dancing to the rhythms of a Balkan soundtrack.  See "Sonámbulo (The Sleepwalker)" by Theodore Ushev, in the Video Arts Gallery, pre-security, in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2zTHGDG
